import { Component } from "react"; import { nanoid } from 'nanoid' import styles from './phoneBook.module.css' class PhoneBook extends Component { state = { contacts: [], name: '' } render() { const { contacts } = this.state; const elements = contacts.map(({ id, name, number }) => (
  • {name}: {number}
    • )); return (
      { elements }
    ) } } export default PhoneBook
